title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Understanding Human-Mobility Interaction in Smart Mobility

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: One can explain the core concepts of human-mobility interaction (HMI) occurring in smart mobility systems.
One understands HMI analysis methods utilizing multimodal data (text, video, sensor data).
Based on data collected from real-world road environments, this study interprets HMI scenarios to propose strategies for improving traffic efficiency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
